clubs.name: Crescendo
clubs.description: Established in 2020, Crescendo is the vibrant and dynamic music club of IIIT Nagpur, symbolizing the rising rhythm of creativity and community.

clubs.name: CRISPR
clubs.description: CRISPR aims to reshape the cultural, technical, and interpersonal DNA of IIIT Nagpur by promoting innovation and collaboration.

clubs.name: Dimensions
clubs.description: Dimensions explores AR, VR, XR, Game Development, and Virtual Production, equipping students with future-ready skills.

clubs.name: Dot Slash
clubs.description: DotSlash is IIITN's coding club for competitive programming enthusiasts, fostering a strong coding culture across the campus.

clubs.name: DTraxia
clubs.description: D-TARAXIA is the dance wing of IIITN, celebrating culture and creativity through expressive movement and rhythm.

clubs.name: Eklavya
clubs.description: Eklavya is the sports wing under Kshitij, the annual sports fest of IIITN, celebrating athleticism, competition, and teamwork.

clubs.name: Elevate
clubs.description: Elevate is a peer-to-peer skill development club helping students grow across technical and personal development domains.

clubs.name: Estoria
clubs.description: Estoria brings drama, literature, and design together to form the storytelling and creative core of IIIT Nagpur.

clubs.name: IoTics
clubs.description: IoTics is the IoT and Robotics wing of IIITN, fostering innovation in smart systems and robotics.

clubs.name: Orator
clubs.description: The Orator Club focuses on debate, eloquence, and public speaking—shaping confident communicators at IIITN.

clubs.name: Probe
clubs.description: Probe Club specializes in photography, videography, and social media content—capturing the essence of campus life.

clubs.name: Strokes
clubs.description: Strokes is IIITN's design hub, promoting UI/UX and graphic design through creativity and collaboration.

clubs.name: Udyam
clubs.description: Udyam is the entrepreneurship cell of IIITN, fostering innovation, startups, and student-led ventures.

clubs.name: GDG IIITN
clubs.description: GDG IIITN is an independent student chapter affiliated with the global Google Developer Group community.
